TopicTitle: KSP doesnt open, just stays as a small bar

Articles.Content:
Ok so whenever i load both my unmodded and modded KSP installs its just a small white bard with the normal icons to minus exit ot and full screen it with the  little kerbal standing next to it, and it never actually goes into a full window

So im confused here, do you guys need a log? its happening to an unmodded install. If yall need anything just tell me cuz i am a tech dummy
nevermind, it popped up after about an hour
Err.. so your KSP playing experience now is to start KSP, wait one hour, then play?
